title.en: Graduation Thesis in Science and Technology

Nooruse 1
50411 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Bachelor's thesis is an independent written work that is based on an experimental or theoretical scientific research.
description.et: Bakalaureusetöö on eksperimentaalse ja teoreetilise teadusliku uurimuse põhjal koostatud iseseisev kirjalik töö.

objectives.en: The goal is to develop the ability to plan, to do and to present the research of specialty field.
objectives.et: Võimaldada üliõpilasel arendada erialase uurimistöö planeerimise, läbiviimise ja esitamise oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has completed the module:
1) knows the chosen field in depth and is able to formulate the related theses presented for defence;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) tunneb süvendatult valitud valdkonda ja oskab formuleerida selle raames kaitsmisele esitatud teese;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to present and critically analyse positions published in professional literature and present and justify their personal standpoints and conclusions;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab esitada ja kriitiliselt analüüsida erialases kirjanduses avaldatud seisukohti ja esitada ning põhjendada oma seisukohti ja järeldusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) knows the scientific level and application value of studies in the field;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) tunneb valdkonna uuringute teaduslikku taset ja rakenduslikku väärtust;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows how to prepare and present a public presentation and participate in discussions;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab koostada ja pidada avalikku ettekannet ning osaleda diskussioonides;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) knows the requirements set for a research paper and is able to formulate research results according to these requirements;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) teab teadustööle esitatavaid nõudeid ja oskab vormistada oma töö tulemused neile vastavalt;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to conduct practical works related to the field.
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab läbi viia erialaga seonduvaid praktilisi töid.

grade_preconditions.et:
1. Student must submit a written application signed by supervisor that he/she/they agree(-s) to supervise student.
2. Student must submit the BSc thesis by deadline. The deadline is 20th of May, 2025.
3. Student must submit supervisor's opinion (where it is clearly stated that student is allowed to defend the thesis) together with submitting graduation thesis.
4. Student must submit the application for appointing the reviewer of the gradiation thesis signed by student, supervisor and reviewer.

Thesis application template can be downloaded from here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YNNBba5fMlvywEbTmdbRN-eqogzzFLYrfS5BbaAF-ZQ/edit?usp=share_link

Thesis template can be downloaded from here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aJiVwyfz1dipgPjZoZGqPy-fa1nqYtLZ/edit?usp=share_link&ouid=102926644254385956316&rtpof=true&sd=true

Application for appointing the reviewer https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_56-QXX6dzKH_T9FA8sTksdZ50tcltF8/edit?usp=share_link&ouid=102926644254385956316&rtpof=true&sd=true

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
